fields.label: Commenti
fields.description: I commenti vengono mostrati quando l'utente visualizza le risposte suggerite per tutte le diapositive.

fields.label: Invisibile
fields.description: Cursore predefinito, nessun titolo e nessun indice scheda. Attenzione: gli utenti con disabilità o che utilizzano solo la tastiera utenti avranno problemi con questo elemento.

fields.label: Image
fields.englishDescription: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.
fields.description: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.

semantics.label: Impostazioni.
semantics.description: Queste opzioni ti consente di ignorare le impostazioni.

fields.label: Activate Active Surface Mode
fields.description: Removes navigation controls for the end user. Use Go To Slide to navigate.

fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
